metadata.name: Friend#1
metadata.description:
As an American contemporary modern artist, Justin Pierce has found his passion in fine arts, product design and urban murals to touch people and their emotions. His use of colors and patterns makes his work unique and attractive to both the young and the young at heart.

As of the first sale of the NFT, the new owner of the NFT is granted a worldwide, royalty-free, non-sublicensable, non-exclusive, license to copy, redistribute and create derivative works from the NFT in any medium or format and for any purpose including commercial purposes; provided, however, that immediately upon each subsequent transfer, sale or other dispossession of the NFT, this license shall terminate as to the former owner of the NFT and automatically transfer to the then-current owner.

Creator: Justin Pierce
metadata.creator: Justin Pierce
